title: Getting Results on the Spiritual Path
description: A kaleidoscope of insights into what blocks your spiritual growth and prevents you from getting results on your path. The author shares his own vast experience and shows you how to get long-term results from your study of spiritual teachings and your practice of spiritual techniques.The book reads like a happy marriage between "Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance" and "A Course in Miracles." The author manages to tell a personal story while describing insights of unparalleled depth and complexity. There is no other book that has described the spiritual path with such penetrating honesty and clarity.You will receive numerous insights not found in any other spiritual book.
